title: Nimagai
description: Nimagai's (in english Nimagie) precious story tells about the unique journey of a young girl whose circumstances force her to depart on a solitary search for her real essence. Why are you here?Have you been born for a specific purpose?What is the mission you must carry out, as no one but you can do? A magnificent tale for all ages, so purely written and so simply told. This book will magically move you... and persuade you toDISCOVER the SECRET of your TRUE ESSENCE!!
author: Nunu Principe
